Set player options

v_specs_player.Rd

Set player options

Usage

v_specs_player(vc, ...)

Arguments

vc

An htmlwidget created with vchart().

...

Options for the legend, see examples or online documentation.

Value

A vchart() htmlwidget object.

Examples


library(vchartr)

world_electricity %>% 
  subset(type == "detail") %>% 
  vchart() %>%
  v_bar(
    aes(source, generation, player = year)
  )
